articles.description: Gregory is responding to pokes on Twitter by writing that the Cowboys have “a toxic fan base that believe I owe them something. LOL.”
articles.content:
FRISCO - Randy Gregory has put the Dallas Cowboys behind him - contractually, if not emotionally.
Gregory spent Wednesday night in Denver dining with Broncos team officials ... and posting a message… [+2207 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Dunleavy
articles.title: Juwan Howard consoles Tennessee's Kennedy Chandler in another viral handshake-line moment - New York Post
articles.description: There’s another must-see Juwan Howard video from a handshake line.
articles.content:
Theres another must-see Juwan Howard video from a handshake line.

articles.author: Mike Jones, USA TODAY
articles.title: Los Angeles Rams, Matthew Stafford agree to four-year extension - USA TODAY
articles.description: A little more than a month after he led the Los Angeles Rams to victory in the Super Bowl, quarterback Matthew Stafford has cashed in.
articles.content:
A little more than a month after he led the Los Angeles Rams to victory in the Super Bowl, quarterback Matthew Stafford has cashed in.
The 14th-year veteran and the Rams agreed on Saturday to a four… [+775 chars]
